rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all cruises. These are mso:travel.travel events whose mode of travel is a cruise ship and is usually for leisure.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cruise

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.cruise to an mso:travel.leisure_activity available to passengers.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Activity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.cruise to the mso:business.operation that runs the cruise.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cruise Line

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a cruise to information about the cabins that can be booked for the cruise.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cruise Room

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.cruise to the set of mso:travel.cruise_day(s) that make up the individual legs of the cruise.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Itinerary

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.cruise to the mso:boats.ship used as the cruise's vessel.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ship

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.cruise to the general size of the ship used in the cruise.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ship Size

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of cruise days. These are the scheduled days on a cruise that may have an arrival and departure time and a port.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cruise Day

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.cruise_day to a number indicating the relative ordering of the cruise_day with respect to other cruise_days in the same cruise.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Day

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all cruise ship rooms. These are the rooms passengers book for trips on the ship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cruise Room

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.cruise_room to its mso:common.pricing_relationship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Pricing

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.cruise_room to its type, the general groupings of room types. This includes things like 'stateroom' or 'interior room'.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of locations that are considered travel destinations. These are the places people visit as a place of interest.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Travel Destination

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a destination to a hotel, motel, resort, etc. that can be booked at or near the destination.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Accommodation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.destination to an mso:travel.activity available at the destination. Examples of activities include snorkeling, skiing, scuba diving, hiking.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Activities

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a destination to information about the expected temperatures and rainfall at the destination on a month-by-month basis.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Climate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property linking a destination to a guidebook covering the destination. Guidebooks usually contain information about climate, customs, attractions, and other information a traveller will find useful.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Guidebooks

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a travel destination to a trip that leaves from or is located within the destination.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Itinerary

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a destination to a metropolitan transit system that serves the destination.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Local Transportation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a travel destination to information about the relative popularity of the destination during the various months of the year.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Monthly Popularity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a destination to companies or individuals that offer tours of the destination or some part of it.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Tour Operators

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a destination to a place of interest at the destination. For example, the Eiffel Tower is a tourist attraction of Paris.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Tourist Attractions

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a travel destination to free text recommendations about what to see in and around the travel destination.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Tourist Tips

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a destination to information about how to get around within the destination, as well as information about day trips to and from the destination.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Transportation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data on a destination's monthly climate. Data in this relationship include the month, the max and min temperature, and rainfall.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Travel Destination Monthly Climate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property providing the average daily maximum temperature (in degrees celsius) for the given month of the specified destination.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Maximum Temperature

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property providing the average daily minimum temperature (in degrees celsius) for the given month of the specified destination.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Minimum Temperature

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property providing the average daily rainfall (in millimeters) for the given month of the specified destination.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Daily Rainfall

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property specifying the month for which climate information is provided.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Month

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property specifying the destination for which climate information is provided.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Travel Destination

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all guide books. These are the written works describing the sights of an mso:travel.destination and the best ways to visit them.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Guidebook

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a travel guidebook to the series, publisher, or brand of the guidebook, eg. Lonely Planet or Frommers.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Series

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a guidebook to a destination covered by the guidebook.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Travel Destinations Covered

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all guidebook series. These are the sets of guide books that cover different locations and destinations that are published by the same company.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Guidebook Series

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a series of guidebooks to one of the books in the series.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Guidebooks

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Any travel that is part of an organized group that includes designated guides to provide assistance and information about sites visited.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Guided Tour

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a guided tour with an action of reserving a spot on the tour.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Book Tour

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Any tour that involves contracting a helicopter and pilot.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Helicopter Charter

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A tour where the mode of travel is a hot air balloon.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Hot Air Balloon Tour

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all leisure activities. Leisure activities are the activities engaged in separate from work, business, or domestic responsibilities. Examples include pleasure shopping, but not grocery shopping, snorkeling, and hiking.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Leisure Activity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating an mso:travel.leisure_activity to a general grouping of similar activities. For example, 'hiking' can be considered an 'outdoors' type and 'active' type.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Stores that offer products and services related to travel, e.g. currency exchange, travel documents, travel health and safety, luggage, and travel packing services.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Luggage and Travel Accessories Store

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type for collecting information about the popularity of a particular month for a given travel destination.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Monthly Popularity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the month for which popularity information about the given travel destination is provided.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Month

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the popularity of the given travel destination for the particular month. Popularity is a number between 0 and 10, 0 being the least popular and 10 being the most popular.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Popularity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all trips undertaken for research purposes.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Research Expedition

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.research_expedition to the vehicle(s) used to make the trip.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Vehicle

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity type representing the collection of all submarine dives. These are the events in which a submarine is submerged for a period of time.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Submarine Dive

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.submarine_dive to the depth of the dive.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Depth

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.submarine_dive to the mso:boats.submarine that makes the dive.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Platform

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.submarine_dive to the mso:travel.research_expedition that the dive is a part of.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Expedition

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.submarine_dive to the mso:boats.ship from which the dive was made.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Support Vehicle

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all tour operators. Tour operators plan and run tours within and to mso:travel.destinations.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Tour operator

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a tour operator to a travel destination that is served by the tour operator.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Travel Destinations

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of places of interest within travel destinations. This is a broad collection that includes places like the Grand Canyon and Sea World, specific objects like the Eiffel Tower or the Lincoln Memorial, and events like folk art festivals and music concerts.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Tourist Attraction

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a tourist attraction to the number of people who visit the site each year.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Annual Visitors

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a tourist attraction to the average amount of time, in hours, actually spent or recommended to be spent to appreciate the tourist attraction.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Stay

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a tourist attraction to an action of buying a ticket to the attraction.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Buy Ticket

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A Boolean property that specifies whether camping facilities are provided at or near the tourist attraction.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Camping

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a tourist attraction to its specific location.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Location

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a tourist attraction to a travel destination that contains it or from which the attraction can be visited in a day trip.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Near Travel Destination

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a tourist attraction to an action of reading a guidebook about the attraction.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Read Guidebook

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a tourist attraction to information about tickets, if any, that are needed for the attraction.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ticket

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of travel transport operators. Note that this type is different in meaning from metropolitan_transit.transit_agency. Travel transport operators include transportation companies that cater only to tourists, e.g. "Ride the Ducks", and they may not include certain types of transit agencies, e.g. those that only offer transportation between bedroom communities and the center of a metropolitan area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Transport Operator

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a travel transport operator to a destination within which or to/from which the operator provides transportation.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Travel Destinations Served

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A location where tourists can board or disembark the transportation offered by a travel transportation operator.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Transport Terminus

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a travel transport terminus to a destination that is accessible from the terminus.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Travel Destinations Served

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data on tourist transportation available for a given destination. Data included in this relationship are operator, mode of transportation, and terminus. Note that tourist transportation will include services that cater only to tourists, e.g. "Ride the Ducks", and it may not include certain types of mass transit, e.g. those that only offer transportation between bedroom communities and the center of a metropolitan area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Tourist Transportation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the company that provides the transportation service.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Transport Operator

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property specifying a location where the transportation service can be boarded or disembarked.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Transport Terminus

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property specifying the mode of transportation used by the service. Modes of transportation are the means by which people are transported within, as well as to/from, destinations.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Mode of Transportation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that specifies the destination within which or to/from which the transportation service operates.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Travel Destination

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of travel transportation modes. Modes of transportation are the means by which people are transported within, as well as to/from, destinations. Dominant modes of transport are aviation, land transport, which includes rail, road and off-road transport, and ship transport.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Transportation Mode

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary event representing the collection of all travel events. These are the events in which a mso:people.person engages in the act of going to or from a destination. Types of travel include business travel and leisure travel.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Travel

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a travel event to the date/time when the destination is reached.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Arrival Time

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.travel to the original point of departure.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Departs

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a travel event to the date/time when the departing location is left.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Departure Time

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.travel to the location.location that is the travel destination. Property is a narrower version of time.event.location, as one instance of travel may pass through several more locations than are destinations. Note that there may be more than one destination on any given trip.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Destination

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of disembarkation points in the course of the trip.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Stops

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.travel to its purpose, an mso:media_common.subject.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Purpose

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies a list of destinations that are part of the trip in the order in which the destinations are visited.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ranked Destinations

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.travel to the length of the trip in number of nights.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Trip Length

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:travel.travel to its type, a designation such as 'one way' or 'business travel'.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Trip Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A company that specializes in planning and booking travel arrangements for clients.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Travel Agency

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity containing entities representing day-long portions of a travel itinerary covering multiple days.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Travel Day

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the sequence of the day in its corresponding itinerary.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Day

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that collects data about the requirements for citizens of a particular country when they travel to another country.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Travel Requirements

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the minimum length of number of blank pages that the passport of the citizen must contain (for receiving visa stamps) in order to visit the destination country.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Blank Passport Pages

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the citizenship of the person traveling.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Country of Citizenship

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the destination country of the person traveling.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Destination

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the maximum amount of currency that citizens of the given country are allowed to bring with them when they enter the destination country.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Maximum Currency on Entrance

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the maximum amount of currency that citizens of the given country are allowed to bring with them when they exit the destination country.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Maximum Currency on Exit

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the minimum length of time that the passport of the citizen must be valid in order to visit the destination country.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Passport Validity Duration

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies whether and under what conditions the citizen must obtain a visa in order to travel to the destination country.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Tourist Visa Required

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies an infectious disease against which a citizen of the given country must be vaccinated in order to visit the destination country. Note that this property should be used only if the Boolean property mso:travel.travel_requirements.vaccinations_required has been set to 1.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Vaccinations

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that indicates whether and under what conditions any vaccinations are needed by citizens of the given country to visit the destination country.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Vaccinations Required
